name: Mint Shiso Tisane
description: With hints of fennel and also a spicy note, like cinnamon, shiso adds complexity to the classic, cooling mint tea.
recipeIngredient: 15 small sprigs fresh mint, plus more for garnish if desired
5 sprigs fresh shiso, plus more for garnish if desired

recipeInstructions.text: Place the mint and shiso in a large heatproof container. Pour boiling water over the herbs and let steep for 15 minutes. Pour through a fine mesh strainer into a second heatproof container. Discard solids.
Let cool to room temperature then refrigerate until cold. Serve in ice filled glasses, garnished with a small sprig of fresh mint and or shiso if desired.
